scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.prepareios: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-wechat-share-plugin && tns plugin add .. && tns install && tns prepare ios
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-wechat-share-plugin && tns plugin add .. && tns install && tns prepare android && tns prepare ios
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
